mapper.select: select * from( select a1.*, rownum rnum from( select cc.COMMENT_NO ,cc.USER_NO ,cc.CHAL_NO ,cc.RECOMMENT_TARGET ,cc.REPLY ,cc.CREATE_DATE ,cc.STATUS ,u.NICK ,p.PICTURE ,p.IS_OPEN from CHALLENGE_COMMENT cc left join USERS u on(u.USER_NO = cc.USER_NO) left join PROFILE p on(cc.USER_NO = p.USER_NO) where cc.CHAL_NO = #{chalNo} and cc.RECOMMENT_TARGET = null order by cc.COMMENT_NO DESC ) a1 where rownum <= (#{currentPage}+1) * #{showLimit} ) where rnum > #{currentPage} * #{showLimit}
